paragraphs: Hi, I'm Sumit Subedi, a passionate software developer with expertise in full-stack development. Currently, I'm focusing on building scalable and efficient applications. I have a deep interest in problem-solving and continuously improving my skills.
I'm a very ambitious full-stack developer looking for a role in an established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.
